WRITING.TEXT: That's awesome, congratulations!!! Have fun this weekend!

* **Breakfast**: 12.5mg Primatene, 100mg Caffeine, 25g Fiberone Cinnamon Coffee Cake Bar (90) * **Lunch**: 12.5mg Primatene, 100mg Caffeine, 28g Quest Salted Caramel Protein Powder, 240ml Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla (130) * **Dinner**: Mussels Frites (530 according to website)
**TOTAL**: 750
One of my best friends just got a new job and we're taking her out tonight to celebrate. I really struggle with trying to project an image of normalcy around my group, especially because a lot of my friends have terrible eating habits. Case in point, the place we're going tonight doesn't even have a salad option on the menu! But even if I were to get something like that, they'd give me a hard time. Fortunately the website has calorie counts so I picked the most reasonable one I can find.
Here's hoping I'm able to stick to it and my friends don't make any commentary.
I used my usual scale! That's why it was so bizarre haha but thank you :D I was the same weight this morning too so it wasn't a one-off!

Lmao it never happens to me either! But I feel you... honestly I don't even know what really possessed me to try it tonight because it's super high-risk, high-reward. Even the slightest fluctuations can completely ruin my mood :/
